WEATHER FORECAST FOR 02 September 2023: The  prevailing  showery  condition  in  south-western  part  of  the  Island
Showers will occur at times in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Southern, Central and Northwestern

provinces.  Heavy  showers  above  100mm  are 
likely  at  some  places
Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Eastern and Uva province and in
Polonnaruwa, Vavuniya and Mullaitivu districts during the evening or night.
General  public  is  kindly  requested  to  take  adequate  precautions  to  minimize  damages
caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
